title: JSON schema for Team Essentials: Debug Configuration

output.description: Add the vscode command (from keyboard bindings) that correlates to what you wish to see at debug start in the *output* area.

explorer.description: Add the vscode command (from keyboard bindings) that correlates to what you wish to see at debug start in the *explorer* area.

output.description: Add the vscode command (from keyboard bindings) that correlates to what you wish to see at debug stop in the *output* area.

explorer.description: Add the vscode command (from keyboard bindings) that correlates to what you wish to see at debug stop in the *explorer* area.

terminatePreLaunchTask.description: Configure if you wish to terminate the prelaunch task.
